actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for purposes of the personal exemption deduction that a child born of an individual shall be considered to be a child of such individual for the 9-month period before birth.

summary.text: Allows an income tax exemption under the Internal Revenue Code for a child born of an individual for the 9-month period before birth.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for purposes of the personal exemption deduction that a child born of an individual shall be considered to be a child of such individual for the 9-month period before birth.
